attributes.action: NHS to provide acne treatment using proven aesthetic procedures
attributes.additional_details:
For acne sufferers to be given treatment using aesthetic procedures on the NHS.
Treatments such as LED light therapy, costs nothing to run and low cost to purchase. This should be available to patients on a weekly basis via the NHS. Chemical peels and laser treatment should be available when refereed by their GP,  after a year of no improvement with medication.
These treatments MUST be available on the NHS to help the lives of many acne sufferers.
